name: Chaos Space Marine
extraSubCategories:
Awareness (Per), Climb (S), Command (Fel) +10,
Dodge (Ag) +10, Forbidden Lore (Daemons, Warp) (Int),
Intimidate (S) +20, Literacy (Int), Scrutiny (Per), Speak
Language (Low Gothic, Unholy Tongue) (Int), Survival (Int),
Swim (S).

Astartes Weapon Training, Bolter Drill, Die Hard,
Fearless, Hatred (Loyalist Space Marines), Heightened Senses
(Sight, Sound, Smell), Jaded, Killing Strike, Quick Draw,
Rapid Reload, Swift Attack, True Grit.

Dark Sight, Size (Hulking), Unnatural Strength (x2),
Unnatural Toughness (x2).

Astartes Power Armour (Head 8, Arms 8, Body 10,
Legs 8).
